1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Time
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Time.Time
6  ( -- * Data type
7    Time (..), Zone,
8    timeMjd,
9    timeYmdTuple,
10    timePrecision,
11
12    -- * Construction
13    timeYmd, timeYmdc, timeFromMjd,
14    timeFromYmAb, timeFromYwAb,
15    timeFromDczAb,
16    timeFromYmd, timeFromYmdTuple,
17
18    -- * Construction with I/O
19    nowUtc, nowZoned, now, today,
20
21    -- * Conversion
22    timeCutClock, timeAltZone, timeCutZone,
23    timeLocalize,
24    timeAltDate, timeAltDays,
25    timeFromZonedTime,
26    timeDaysSec,
27  ) where
28
29import qualified Data.Time.Calendar                         as Tim
30import qualified Data.Time.Calendar.WeekDate                as Tim
31import qualified Data.Time.Clock                            as Tim
32import qualified Data.Time.LocalTime                        as Tim
33import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                   as O
34import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                       as B
35import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Time.Clock       as D
36import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Time.ClockCalc   as D
37import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Time.Date        as D
38import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Message          as Msg
39
40
41-- ----------------------  Time
42
43-- | Time is a small duration on timeline.
44data Time
45    = TimeYmdcz D.Date D.Clock Zone  -- ^ Date and clock with time zone
46    | TimeYmdc  D.Date D.Clock       -- ^ Date and clock
47    | TimeYmd   D.Date               -- ^ Year, month, and day
48    | TimeYw    D.Mjd                -- ^ Year and week
49    | TimeYm    D.Mjd                -- ^ Year and month
50      deriving (Eq, Ord)
51
52-- | Time zone as offset from UTC.
53type Zone = D.Sec
54
55-- | Get integer content of the Modified Julian Day of time.
56--
57--   >>> timeMjd $ timeFromMjd 55555
58--   55555
59--
60timeMjd :: Time -> D.Days
61timeMjd = Tim.toModifiedJulianDay . timeDay
62
63-- Get the Modified Julian Day of time.
64timeDay :: Time -> D.Mjd
65timeDay (TimeYmdcz d _ _)   = D.dateMjd d
66timeDay (TimeYmdc  d _)     = D.dateMjd d
67timeDay (TimeYmd   d)       = D.dateMjd d
68timeDay (TimeYw    d)       = d
69timeDay (TimeYm    d)       = d
70
71-- | Convert time to year\/month\/day tuple.
72--
73--   >>> timeYmdTuple $ timeFromMjd 55555
74--   (2010,12,25)
75--
76timeYmdTuple :: Time -> D.Ymd
77timeYmdTuple = Tim.toGregorian . timeDay
78
79-- | Get the name of time precision.
80timePrecision :: Time -> String
81timePrecision (TimeYmdcz _ c _)  = D.clockPrecision c ++ " zone"
82timePrecision (TimeYmdc  _ c)    = D.clockPrecision c
83timePrecision (TimeYmd   _)      = "day"
84timePrecision (TimeYw    _)      = "week"
85timePrecision (TimeYm    _)      = "month"
86
87
88-- ----------------------  Write
89
90instance Show Time where
91    show = B.mixToFlatString . B.mixEncode
92
93instance B.MixEncode Time where
94    mixEncode = timeToMix
95
96timeToMix :: Time -> B.MixText
97timeToMix time =
98    case time of
99      TimeYmdcz d c z  -> dcz d c z `B.mixSep` szone z
100      TimeYmdc  d c    -> dc d c
101      TimeYmd   d      -> B.mixEncode d
102      TimeYw    day    -> yw $ Tim.toWeekDate  day
103      TimeYm    day    -> ym $ Tim.toGregorian day
104    where
105      dcz               :: D.Date -> D.Clock -> Zone -> B.MixText
106      dcz d c z         = let c'       = D.clockAddSec z c
107                              (day, _) = D.clockDaysSec c'
108                          in dc (day `D.dateAdd` d) (D.clockCutDay c')
109
110      dc                :: D.Date -> D.Clock -> B.MixText
111      dc d c            = B.mixEncode d `B.mixSep` D.clockBodyToMix c
112
113      zone z            = hm $ D.dhmsFromSec z
114      szone z           = case z `compare` 0 of
115                            EQ -> B.mixString "UTC"
116                            LT -> B.mixString "-" B.<> zone z
117                            GT -> B.mixString "+" B.<> zone z
118
119      hm (_, h, m, _)   = B.mixJoin ":"  [D.mix02 h, D.mix02 m]
120      yw (y, w, _)      = B.mixJoin "-#" [B.mixDec y, B.mixDec w]
121      ym (y, m, _)      = B.mixJoin "-"  [B.mixDec y, D.mix02 m]
122
123
124-- ----------------------  Construct
125
126-- | Create monthly date from the Modified Julian Day.
127timeYmd :: D.Mjd -> Time
128timeYmd = TimeYmd . D.Monthly
129
130-- | Create monthly time from the Modified Julian Day and clock.
131timeYmdc :: D.Mjd -> D.Clock -> Time
132timeYmdc = TimeYmdc . D.Monthly
133
134-- | Create time data form modified Julian date.
135--
136--   >>> timeFromMjd 55555
137--   2010-12-25
138--
139timeFromMjd :: D.Days -> Time
140timeFromMjd = timeYmd . Tim.ModifiedJulianDay
141
142-- | Create time data from year and month.
143timeFromYmAb :: D.Year -> D.Month -> B.Ab Time
144timeFromYmAb y m =
145    case Tim.fromGregorianValid y m 1 of
146      Just day -> Right $ TimeYm day
147      Nothing  -> Msg.notDate y m 1
148
149-- | Create time data from year and week.
150timeFromYwAb :: D.Year -> D.Week -> B.Ab Time
151timeFromYwAb y w =
152    case Tim.fromWeekDateValid y w 1 of
153      Just day -> Right $ TimeYw day
154      Nothing  -> Msg.notDate y w 1
155
156-- | Create time data from date, clock, and time zone.
157timeFromDczAb :: D.Date -> D.Clock -> Maybe Zone -> B.Ab Time
158timeFromDczAb d c Nothing  = Right $ timeFromDc  d c
159timeFromDczAb d c (Just z) = Right $ timeFromDcz d c z
160
161timeFromDc :: D.Date -> D.Clock -> Time
162timeFromDc d c = let (d', c') = D.clockDaysClock c
163                 in TimeYmdc (D.dateAdd d' d) c'
164
165timeFromDcz :: D.Date -> D.Clock -> Zone -> Time
166timeFromDcz d c z = let (d', c') = D.clockDaysClock c
167                    in TimeYmdcz (D.dateAdd d' d) c' z
168
169timeFromYmd :: D.Year -> D.Month -> D.Day -> Time
170timeFromYmd y m d = timeYmd $ Tim.fromGregorian y m d
171
172timeFromYmdTuple :: D.Ymd -> Time
173timeFromYmdTuple = timeYmd . dayFromYmdTuple where
174    dayFromYmdTuple (y, m, d) = Tim.fromGregorian y m d
175
176
177-- ----------------------  Construction with I/O
178
179-- | Get UTC.
180--
181--   >>> nowUtc
182--   2013-04-18 08:37:36 UTC
183--
184nowUtc :: IO Time
185nowUtc = do time <- Tim.getZonedTime
186            let time' = time { Tim.zonedTimeZone = Tim.utc }
187            return $ timeFromZonedTime time'
188
189-- | Get current time with time zone.
190--
191--   >>> nowZoned
192--   2013-04-18 17:37:36 +09:00
193--
194nowZoned :: IO Time
195nowZoned = do time <- Tim.getZonedTime
196              return $ timeFromZonedTime time
197
198-- | Get current local time without time zone.
199--
200--   >>> now
201--   2013-04-18 17:37:36
202--
203now :: IO Time
204now = do time <- Tim.getZonedTime
205         return $ timeLocalize $ timeFromZonedTime time
206
207-- | Get today.
208--
209--   >>> today
210--   2013-04-18
211--
212today :: IO Time
213today = do time <- now
214           return $ timeCutClock time
215
216
217-- ----------------------  Conversion
218
219-- | Cut timezone.
220timeCutZone :: O.Map Time
221timeCutZone (TimeYmdcz d c _)  = timeFromDc d c
222timeCutZone (TimeYmdc  d c)    = TimeYmdc d c
223timeCutZone (TimeYmd   d)      = TimeYmd d
224timeCutZone (TimeYw    d)      = TimeYw  d
225timeCutZone (TimeYm    d)      = TimeYm  d
226
227-- | Cut timezone and convert to local time,
228--   i.e., addition of UTC and time zone.
229timeLocalize :: O.Map Time
230timeLocalize (TimeYmdcz d c z)  = timeFromDc d $ D.clockAddSec z c
231timeLocalize (TimeYmdc  d c)    = TimeYmdc d c
232timeLocalize (TimeYmd   d)      = TimeYmd d
233timeLocalize (TimeYw    d)      = TimeYw  d
234timeLocalize (TimeYm    d)      = TimeYm  d
235
236-- | Alter time zone part.
237timeAltZone :: O.Map Zone -> O.Map Time
238timeAltZone f (TimeYmdcz d c z)  = timeFromDcz d c $ f z
239timeAltZone _ t@(TimeYmdc  _ _)  = t
240timeAltZone _ t@(TimeYmd   _)    = t
241timeAltZone _ t@(TimeYw    _)    = t
242timeAltZone _ t@(TimeYm    _)    = t
243
244-- | Cut clock part.
245timeCutClock :: O.Map Time
246timeCutClock (TimeYmdcz d _ _)  = TimeYmd d
247timeCutClock (TimeYmdc  d _)    = TimeYmd d
248timeCutClock (TimeYmd   d)      = TimeYmd d
249timeCutClock (TimeYw    d)      = TimeYw  d
250timeCutClock (TimeYm    d)      = TimeYm  d
251
252-- | Alter day part.
253timeAltDate :: O.Map D.Date -> O.Map Time
254timeAltDate f (TimeYmdcz d c z)  = TimeYmdcz (f d) c z
255timeAltDate f (TimeYmdc  d c)    = TimeYmdc  (f d) c
256timeAltDate f (TimeYmd   d)      = TimeYmd   (f d)
257timeAltDate _ (TimeYw    d)      = TimeYw    d
258timeAltDate _ (TimeYm    d)      = TimeYm    d
259
260-- | Alter the Modified Julian Day of date part.
261timeAltMjd :: O.Map D.Mjd -> O.Map Time
262timeAltMjd f (TimeYmdcz d c z)   = TimeYmdcz (D.dateAltMjd f d) c z
263timeAltMjd f (TimeYmdc  d c)     = TimeYmdc  (D.dateAltMjd f d) c
264timeAltMjd f (TimeYmd   d)       = TimeYmd   (D.dateAltMjd f d)
265timeAltMjd f (TimeYw    d)       = TimeYw    (f d)
266timeAltMjd f (TimeYm    d)       = TimeYm    (f d)
267
268-- | Alter integer content of the Modified Julian Day.
269timeAltDays :: O.Map D.Days -> O.Map Time
270timeAltDays f time = timeAltMjd g time where
271    g (Tim.ModifiedJulianDay d) = Tim.ModifiedJulianDay $ f d
272
273-- | Convert local time to Koshu time content.
274timeFromZonedTime :: Tim.ZonedTime -> Time
275timeFromZonedTime zt = time where
276    Tim.UTCTime mjd s = Tim.zonedTimeToUTC zt
277    d    = D.dateFromMjd $ Tim.toModifiedJulianDay mjd
278    c    = D.clockFromDhms 0 0 0 $ floor s
279    time = TimeYmdcz d c (60 * Tim.timeZoneMinutes (Tim.zonedTimeZone zt))
280
281-- | Days and seconds of time.
282--
283--   >>> timeDaysSec $ timeFromMjd 55555
284--   (55555,0)
285--
286timeDaysSec :: Time -> D.DaysSec
287timeDaysSec (TimeYmdcz d c _)  = dateClockDaysSec d c
288timeDaysSec (TimeYmdc d c)     = dateClockDaysSec d c
289timeDaysSec (TimeYmd d)        = (D.unMjd $ D.dateMjd d, 0)
290timeDaysSec (TimeYw d)         = (D.unMjd d, 0)
291timeDaysSec (TimeYm d)         = (D.unMjd d, 0)
292
293dateClockDaysSec :: D.Date -> D.Clock -> D.DaysSec
294dateClockDaysSec d c = let (d', s) = D.clockDaysSec c
295                       in (D.unMjd (D.dateMjd d) + d', s)
